## About Siagro

Siagro is a visualization tool designed for testing and displaying charts.

### Purpose

The main purpose of this project is to provide a platform for:

- Testing various chart types
- Visualizing data effectively
- Demonstrating data visualization capabilities

### Technology

This website is built using:

- **Quarto**: An open-source scientific and technical publishing system
- **GitHub Pages**: For hosting and deployment
- **GitHub Actions**: For automated publishing

### Contact

For more information or questions, please visit our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/machelpantin/siagro).
